name: collecting words fixing meanings
description: [a month later, early in the morning, in anticipation of death, everything began spinning before the eyes] :: a first verse made with intertitles; found footage poetry; an attempt to grasp the first language, to caress the mother tongue that has withered away after 30 years of thinking and dreaming in the third one :: intertitles from The Extraordinary Adventures of Mr. West in the Land of the Bolsheviks {1924, Lev Kuleshov; Soviet Union} :: sticky tape, paper collage animation :: 22.07.21 :: @annaxmalina :: annamalina.com
